data.title: Conspectus cobitidum - Raffles Museum of Biodiversity Research

data.text: THE RAFFLES BULLETIN OF ZOOLOGY 2012 THE RAFFLES BULLETIN OF ZOOLOGY 2012 Supplement No. 26: 1–199 Date of Publication: 28 Dec.2012 © National University of Singapore and the author CONSPECTUS COBITIDUM*: AN INVENTORY OF THE LOACHES OF THE WORLD (TELEOSTEI: CYPRINIFORMES: COBITOIDEI) Maurice Kottelat Case postale 57, CH-2952 Cornol, Switzerland (address for correspondence), and Raffles Museum of Biodiversity Research, Department of Biological Sciences, National University of Singapore, 6 Science Drive 2, Singapore 117546, Republic of Singapore. E-mail: mkottelat@dplanet.ch CONTENTS Abstract ...................................................................................................................... 1 Introduction ............................................................................................................... 3 Name-bearing types ................................................................................................... 6 Ending and spelling of species names ....................................................................... 8 Abbreviations used .................................................................................................. 12 Family Gyrinocheilidae ........................................................................................... 14 Family Botiidae ....................................................................................................... 14 Family Vaillantellidae .............................................................................................. 21 Family Cobitidae ..................................................................................................... 21 Family Ellopostomatidae......................................................................................... 43 Family Barbuccidae................................................................................................. 43 Family Balitoridae ................................................................................................... 44 Family Gastromyzontidae ....................................................................................... 57 Family Serpenticobitidae......................................................................................... 73 Family Nemacheilidae ............................................................................................. 74 Appendix: New genus-group and family-group names ........................................ 137 Acknowledgements ............................................................................................... 141 Bibliography .......................................................................................................... 142 Index ...................................................................................................................... 175 ABSTRACT. — The taxonomy and nomenclature of the fishes of the superfamily Cobitoidea (suborder Cobitoidei minus Catostomidae) are reviewed. Original descriptions of all 1499 recorded species-group names and 185 genus-group names have been checked for correct spelling, types and bibliographic references. The bibliography includes about 1010 titles. 1043 valid species in 111 valid genera are recognised. Synonymies are given, based on published information as well as unpublished observations. Endings consistent with the three possible Latin grammatical * Cobitidum is formed on the common name cobites or cobitis, meaning loaches in general, and not on the formal name of the suborder Cobitoidei. 1
